video.title: Nazi Mega Weapons
video.synopsis: This documentary series examines Nazi Germany's military hardware, defenses and technology, including fortifications, U-boats and ballistic missiles.

episodes.synopsis: Fearing Allied invasion of occupied Europe, Hitler ordered a massive defensive wall built, from France in the south to Norway in the north.
episodes.title: Atlantic Wall

episodes.synopsis: To protect their infamous U-boats in port, the Nazis built concrete pens so strong they were able to withstand Allied bombs -- and still stand today.
episodes.title: U-Boat Base

episodes.synopsis: The pioneering work of Nazi scientist Wernher von Braun heralded the creation of the ballistic missile and paved the way for the space race.
episodes.title: V2 Rocket

episodes.synopsis: Not satisfied with having the world's largest tank at 180 tons, Hitler ordered the construction of a 1,000-ton super tank, sparking an arms race.
episodes.title: Super Tanks

episodes.synopsis: Explore the Nazis' Messerschmitt Me262, the most technologically advanced plane of Word War II, and the underground bat cave where it was built.
episodes.title: Jet Fighter Me262

episodes.synopsis: Explore the Fuhrerbunker, Hitler's underground Berlin fortress with four-meter thick concrete walls and surrounded by kill zones and strong points.
episodes.title: Fortress Berlin
